name: YogaGuide
0:
”Alexa, open yoga guide”
”Alexa, ask yoga guide for the latest update”
”Alexa, start yoga guide”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yoga guide
des: Listen to the latest blogs posts from your favorite blog. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
